page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT & INDUSTRY
page.content: ENTERTAINNMENT The Pantomine Players produce an annual pantomine in March. About 80 people are involved in putting on a spectacular entertainment for the family. Locals provide the script, music, cast, scene painters and all the back-stage support. The same society produced a Revue in 1984 - a variety show with local talent performing in song, dance, music and sketches. A Childrens Drama Group puts on occasional productions. INDUSTRY There is very little industry in Marshfield apart from an electronics factory and a printer. There is a wealth of trade, including 2 garages, car tuner, 2 hauliers, 2 coach props., suppliers of machinery & agricultural plant, refrigerators, and moto-cross bikes. Inns, shops, banks, small builders, electricians and a post office cater for all needs.
